statements: DELETE FROM NeuralNetworkTrainingLogs WHERE training_id = 10 AND log_message ILIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM optimization_logs WHERE optimization_loss > 0.1 AND optimization_accuracy < 0.9;
DELETE FROM training_progress WHERE model_name = 'resnet101' AND epoch = 10;
DELETE FROM accuracy_logs WHERE network_id = 1 AND epoch_number = 10;
DELETE FROM loss_logs WHERE epoch_number > 100 AND validation_loss > 0.2;
DELETE FROM TrainingLog WHERE model_id = 1 AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
